title: Startups Want to Cash In on the US Student Debt Crisis
description: Companies like SoFi and Chipper offer to help people manage their college loans. But they’re not likely to fix the flawed economics of education.

title: ChatGPT's API Is Here. Let the AI Gold Rush Begin
description: Businesses can now get paid for services built on the large language model, meaning chatbots are going to start appearing everywhere.

title: Why the Floppy Disk Just Won’t Die
description: A surprising number of industries, from embroidery to aviation, still use floppy disks. But the supply is finally running out.
